name: CrowdPicker
overview:
CrowdPicker hosts fast public opinion polls through single question surveys.

The service focuses on enabling start-ups and web-apps to gather feedback on logos, webpage design, icons, taglines, names, and much more. CrowdPicker gathers about 100 votes within an hour, and allows up to 10 answers for respondents to choose from.

The easy to use system allows for a poll to be launched within 3 minutes of signing up, and that leaves time to see the first vote come in. Responses start being tallied immediately, and are updated in real time to be viewed in live graphs.

CrowdPicker is a flexible alternative to traditional market research. Unlike self-hosted surveys that rely on traffic through a pollster’s site, CrowdPicker taps into an engaged pool of respondents that are ready to answer polls 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
